    <sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <access>public</access>
        <active>true</active>
        <api_name>global.WF_IncidentAccess</api_name>
        <caller_access/>
        <client_callable>true</client_callable>
        <description>Script include written for Access related controls on the Incident table fields.</description>
        <name>WF_IncidentAccess</name>
        <script><![CDATA[var WF_IncidentAccess = Class.create();
WF_IncidentAccess.prototype = Object.extendsObject(AbstractAjaxProcessor, {
    //LGWH-26509
    validateCustomerClientRestored: function(current) {
        answer = true;

        if ((gs.hasRole('major_incident_manager')) && (current.getValue("major_incident_state") === "accepted")) {
            if (current.getValue("state") != "7") {
                answer = true;
            } else {
                answer = false;
            }
        } else {
            answer = false;
        }
        return answer;
    },

    //LGWH-26592 - Delete Outage records of incident only if user has MIM role 
    validateOutageAccess: function(current) {
        answer = true;
        if (current.task_number.sys_class_name == 'incident' && gs.hasRole('major_incident_manager'))
            answer = true;
        else
            answer = false;
        return answer;
    },

    //LGWH-21875-INC - Only Users with FSM Roles or Major Incident Manager can Create Work Orders
    canReadWorkOrder: function() {
        //  var reqd_roles = gs.getProperty('wf.inc.create.workorder.roles').split(",");
        if (gs.getUser().hasRole('major_incident_manager')) /// FSM roles are already able to view hence not included them
            return true;
        else
            return false;
    },

	//LGWH-27088_Restrict edit access on major incidents 
	canEditMajorIncident: function(current) {
        var answer;
		if (current.major_incident_state == 'accepted') {

			if (gs.hasRole("major_incident_manager"))
				{ 
					answer = true;         
				}
			else
				{             
					answer = false;         
				}
        return answer;
		}

    },

    type: 'WF_IncidentAccess'
});]]></script>
